Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Shark Tank Depths
Room.ShortDescription: You are down towards the bottom of the deep Bendine Aquarium Shark Tank.
Room.LongDescription: The depths of the shark tank are inhabited by a number of great white sharks and other deadly species, all looking for some lunch. You also notice that there are a lot more sharks down here, moreso than up at the surface. It's probably not a good idea to stay down here too long.
